text: That's probably why I live in a dump!
Come mornin', you'll sound like a new man... If you survive.
You can run, but I'll still be in your nightmares!
Lately, I've been tickerizing with a voice alterizing tonic. On account of my horrrrifyin' voice!
Come here! Follow me into this dark and dangerous alley.
I don't rightly know.
I couldn't help but overhear your situation. Old Man McGucket, part-time inventor.
Hello there!
I'm Old Man McGucket!
Eh? What's happening?
What?
Ehehe! Good night!
It's my dream come true!
I want that there car!
Woo-hoo-hoo! I've been jiggin' here for seven days straight!
Coffee! Coffee! Coffee! Coffee!
Well, time to get back to work on my death ray! Any of you kids got a screwdriver?
or when my pal Ernie didn't come to my retirement party and I constructed an eighty ton SHAME BOT THAT EXPLODED THE ENTIRE DOWNTOWN AREA!
I made lots of robuts in my day! Like when my wife left me and I created a homicidal pterodactyl-tron,
No, sir, I got to work straight on the robut!
In retrospect, it seems a bit contrived. You just don't know the length us old-timers go through for a little quality time with our family.
So I figured maybe I'd catch his fancy with a fifteen ton aquatic robut!
Well, when you get to be an old fella like me, nobody pays any attention to you anymore.  My own son hasn't visited me in months!
Well, first I just hootenannied up a biomechanical brain wave generator, and then I learned to operate a stick-shift with ma beard!
Well, I... I, uh... I just wanted attention.
Work the bellows and the...Eh? Aww, banjo polish!
Monster Hunt! Monster... Eh... I'll go.
Aww, donkey spittle! Aw, banjo polish!
It chawed my boat up to smitheroons, and shim-shammed over to Scuttlebutt Island! YOU GOTTA BELIEVE ME!
It had a long neck like a gee-raffe! And wrinkly skin like...like this gentleman right here!
BEHOLD! It's the Gobble-dy-wonker what done did it!
But I got proof this time, by gummity!
NOOO! It's a jig of grave danger!
I SEEN IT! I SEEN IT AGAIN!! The Gravity Falls Gobblewonker! Come quick before it scrabdoodles away!
(Drops banjo on the floor of the Northwest Manor) Well! I've moved in.
(Pointing to the Northwest Manor) Hey, that one's for sale!
I'm gonna buy me a bigger shed!
Hey! You give them back!
Heh heh!
Come here, old friend.
I've tried forgettin'... maybe I should try forgiving.
Get em, Gobblewonker!
Alright, fellas. Let's hope this turns out better than my other inventions.
What's an "anime"?
Alright. I've made some thingamadiculous robomajigs in my day, but this is the first one that won't be used for evil.
What I meant to say is I think I figured out a way to fight Bill and rescue Ford. But we're all gonna have to work together.
Sorry. Sorry. Got a little excited.
Wha--Whoa! Holy hootenanny! Flapjack and fiddlebanjos.
Where are these ideas coming from? Who are you working with?!
I fear we've unleashed a grave danger on the world. One I'd just as soon forget. I quit!
This machine is dangerous. You'll bring about the end of the world with this. Destroy it before it destroys us all!
When Gravity Falls and earth becomes sky, fear the beast with just one eye.
Ahh! VOTMZRIG IVSKRX OORY.
[Spits]
You say you're tryin' to build a transuniversal polydimensional metavortex? Well that's mathematically feasible! I reckon.
Hello? Fiddleford Computermajigs?
Get in there, raccoon wife! Git!
It's happening! The End Times! When that machine activates... I gotta get outta town!
Oh, this is bad! Somethin's comin'! Somethin' big!
But--!
I fixed the laptop. I been doin' calculations, and I think somethin' terrible is comin'! The apocalypse! The End Times!
Dipper! I've been lookin' for ya.
Woo! Scobbity-doo! Hornswaggle m' goat knees!
It's all so familiar. It's almost like I can remember...
It's beginning to come back, but I need more time. And reading glasses. Heck! I got some rememberin' to do.
(Hamboning:) Thanks for opening my eyes.
Maybe I messed up in the past, but now that I seen what happened, I can begin to put myself together again.
After all these years, I finally know who I am.
Aw, hush. You kids helped me get my memories back, just like you said.
Yroo Xrksvi! Girzmtov!
My hair's been a-fallin' out, so I got this hat from a scarecrow. Hey, are my pants on backwards?
I saw something in the lake, something big!
I wonder if there are any negative side effects...
I accidentally hit another car in town today. I feel terri-bibble! Terrible. I've been forgetting words lately.
Today, I came across a colony of little men, very disturbing. I would like to forget seeing this.
I call it the Society of the Blind Eye. We will help those who want to forget by erasing their bad memories!
It worked! I can't recall a thing.
I believe I have invented a machine that can permanently erase these memories from my mind. Test subject One: Fiddleford.
I decided to quit the project. But I lie awake at night, haunted by the thoughts of what I've done.
I helped him build a machine which he believed had the potential to benefit all mankind, but something went wrong.
He has been cataloging his findings about Gravity Falls in a series of journals.
For the past year, I have been working as an assistant for a visiting researcher.
Sweet sarsaparilla.
My name is Fiddleford Hadron McGucket, and I wish to unsee what I have seen.
I'm not so sure. What if I don't like what I see?
Say goodnight, Sally!
Hit me with your best shot, Baldy. But my mind's been gone for thirty-odd years. You can't break what's already broken!
As okay as I'll ever be!
Why does my beard have a bandage? Does that even make sense? Why has no one pointed that out?
Oh, you've really tarred it up now, Fiddleford. This is all your fault.
The alarm in my brain is a-ringin' again. Ah!
Grabby, grabby. I got it!
Looky, fellers. It's those words what people call me.
Honey fogelin', saltlickin' skullduggery.
Aah! What do we do? Where do we go?
(hamboning:) Oh, *&#*%!
(Slaps his arms and legs. Translation:) Coyotes are coming for our sweetbreads.
We'll have to be stealthy. I'll hambone a message if there's trouble.
I feel like all these eyeballs are a-watchin' me.
Well kettle my corn. He vanish-ified.
Uh, this is, I think.
I... oh, I don't recall.
The Blind Eye! Robes, the men, my mind! They did something!
I told you, I don't recall. Everything before 1982 is just a blur. Just a hazy...
I can't remember what I used to be, but I must've been a big failure to end up like this.
Uh, genius? I'm no genius. I've never done nothin' worthwhile in my life. Everyone knows I'm no good to nobody.
Quit starin' at me when I bathe!
Visitors! Come, come. Pull up some rusty metal. You're just in time for my hourly turf war with the hillbilly what lives in my mirror.
McSuckit, they got me good.
Get outta here, you salt lickin', hornswagglin!...
That joke was really something!
Wha? How'd I get here?
I've got a good feelin' about that kid!
He he he! Only one way to find out!
I ate my way through a dinosaur!
I'm okay!
Well! Weclome to the world, little feller- AAAAUGH!
Do I!?  Nope.
Oh no! She's gone deaf with fear!
YEEEEEEHAW! We found a pterodactyl!
Hmm? Oh. Nobody make any sudden movements or loud noises.
AAAAAAAAUGH! Heh heh. What- what're we doing?
Hey! Cheer up, fellas! I fixed your lantern!
Nope!
So there I am, fighting a raccoon for the same piece of meat, when our mouths get close and we kiss accidentally!
Need someone to tag along and tell weird personal stories?
My, what suspicious laughter!
When this enormous wing-ly critter stole my musical spoons and flew lickety-split into the abandoned mines down yonder!
You'll never believe me! Now I was doin' my hourly hootnanny- Deedly doo ding dang!
Howdy, friends!
Doodly doo do Doo do!
Ahhhhh!
WOOEE! Haha! I've regained my innocence!
Come back! I wanna deep fry your ears!
I'm gonna make you into bacon...
That's what they all say...
Free meal...
McGucket, McGucket, McGucket, wow!
Whoo-wee!
Are you ready for your new voice? This one should be permanent!
You got here just in time. Come sundown, you'd be back to your ridiculous old voice.
This one's for voice over professionals. I'm sure I got an better voice in here somewhere.
Well, now. Here's your problem. I gave you the wrong drinking majiggy.
That's probably why I live in a dump!
